channel.title: C++ on Anirudh Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Anirudh Sharma

item.title: Some changes to the strategy
item.description:
Finally I am dumping the SkSockets approach with our plugin. Though it showed some initial success the if the SKSocket was buffering and finally flushed the data all at once. Which won’t work for this as we need constant refresh of data.

1 - started osc.exe - set it for small screen size and low framerate. 2 - used toxy_win UDP to TCP proxy server (gave a link) 3 - Start the tuioconn.rb code in SU.
